General.Name: Shandong Jinling Mining Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Jinling Mining Co., Ltd. engages in the iron ore mining business in China. It is also involved in the production, mechanical processing, and sale of iron concentrate, copper concentrate, cobalt concentrate, and pellets. The company was formerly known as Shandong Zibo Huaguang Ceramics Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1948 and is based in Zibo, China. Shandong Jinling Mining Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shandong Jinling Mining Limited.
